```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)

# Load Functions.
source("../../functions/myFunctions.R") 

# Load packages.
installMissingPackages(
  c(
    # Include statistical packages.
    "performance",
    "lmerTest",
    "lme4",
    "optimx",
    "MuMIn",
    # Include packages for tidy output.
    "tidyverse",
    "broomExtra",
    "sjPlot",
    "formattable",
    "knitr",
    "RColorBrewer",
    # Include packages for %in% %notin% syntactic notation
    "mefa4"
  )
)

# Set themes and colour schemes.
theme_set(theme_minimal(base_size = 14))

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Consolidate nuc_contour based on observation and types of register shift.
  mutate(
    nuc_contour =
      if_else(
        nuc_contour == "^[L*H %]" | nuc_contour == "^[L*H L%]",
        "^[L*H] %",
        if_else(nuc_contour == "L*^[H L%]", "L*^[H] %", nuc_contour)
      ),
    acc_phon =
      factor(
        str_replace(nuc_contour,
                    "\\s%$|\\sL%$",
                    ""),
        levels = c("H*", "L*H", ">H*", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")
      ),
    fin_phon = str_replace_all(fin_phon, "L%]|%]", "%"),
    fin_phon = factor(fin_phon, levels=unique(fin_phon))
  ) %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    l_t
  ) %>%
  filter(acc_phon %notin% c("H*", ">H*")) %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = c("L*H", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]"))
         )
```

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, eval=FALSE, tidy = TRUE}
l_t_model <-
  lmer(l_t ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender +
         (1 + acc_phon + mode | speaker) + (1 | prompt),
       data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = "optimx",
          calc.derivs = FALSE,
          optCtrl = list(
            method = "nlminb",
            starttests = FALSE,
            kkt = FALSE
          )
        )
      )

summariseLME(l_t_model, run_step=TRUE)

```

-   Convergence and singularity issues.
-   Testing model suggested by step().

```{r run step() model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, eval=FALSE, tidy = TRUE}
summariseLME(l_t_model , run_step=TRUE)

```

-   Convergence and singularity issues.
-   Trying intercepts only model but reintroducing previously removed factors.
-   Model works.
-   Trimming mode to remove residuals from model with standard deviation > 4

#### `l_t ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender + (1 | speaker) + (1 | prompt)`
```{r run intercepts only model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9,  tidy = TRUE}
l_t_model <- lmer(l_t ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender +
                    (1 | speaker) + (1 | prompt),
       data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = "optimx",
          calc.derivs = FALSE,
          optCtrl = list(
            method = "nlminb",
            starttests = FALSE,
            kkt = FALSE
          )
        )
      )

m_corpus.trimmed <- m_corpus %>% filter(abs(scale(resid(l_t_model))) <= 4)

l_t_model.trimmed <- lmer(l_t ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender +
         (1 | speaker) + (1 | prompt),
       data = m_corpus.trimmed,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = "optimx",
          calc.derivs = FALSE,
          optCtrl = list(
            method = "nlminb",
            starttests = FALSE,
            kkt = FALSE
          )
        )
      )

summariseLME(l_t_model.trimmed, run_step=TRUE,
              write="../output_model_anovas/Mode_PA_l_t_anova.csv")

```

```{r make tidy model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}

l_t_model.tidy <- analyseModel(l_t_model.trimmed,
                                write_r2="../output/Mode_PA_l_t"
                                )
l_t_model.tidy$r2

```
